horse.saddle.double.name: 双人马鞍
horse.saddle.double.description: A horse saddle with two seats. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

draculacape.name: 德古拉斗篷
draculacape.description: A robustly thick outer garment providing ample protection to the wearer.

draculamask.name: 德古拉面具
draculamask.description: A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.

hat.dragonmask.name: 龙面具
hat.dragonmask.description: A special dragon mask to celebrate Chinese New Year.

attire.egg.suit.name: 鸡蛋装
attire.egg.suit.description: An eggsquisite egg costume, can be painted when unequipped.

boots.frog.name: 青蛙靴子
boots.frog.description: Added for anyone who owned the game while it was in Early Access. Provides more rad protection than other early game clothes, making it slightly OP.

ghostsheet.name: 幽灵装
ghostsheet.description: Definitely not a last minute costume idea.

gingerbreadsuit.name: 姜饼套装
gingerbreadsuit.description: A suit made of gingerbread, slightly crunchy.

gloweyes.name: 发光的眼睛
gloweyes.description: Lighting effect used for the Halloween 2017 Murderer NPCs.

hazmatsuit.name: 生化防护套装
hazmatsuit.description:
The Hazmat Suit allows the wearer to travel through rad-towns and other irradiated areas safely. While it doesn't provide full protection in certain places at monuments, such as the main building at Launch Site, or the cooling tower at the Nuclear Power Plant, it offers protection from radiation poisoning at almost every other monument on the map, making it useful for exploring.
The suit itself is a bright yellow color, meaning it is easy to spot from a distance.

twitch.headset.name: 耳机
twitch.headset.description: Every gamer needs a headset! - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

frankensteins.monster.03.head.name: 重型科学怪人头部
frankensteins.monster.03.head.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.03.legs.name: 重型科学怪人腿部
frankensteins.monster.03.legs.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.03.torso.name: 重型科学怪人身体
frankensteins.monster.03.torso.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

heavy.plate.helmet.name: 厚钢板头盔
heavy.plate.helmet.description:
A high-tier protective helmet which protects the entire head. It costs High Quality Metal and Sheet Metal making it fairly easy to acquire near monuments and dungeons.
The Heavy Plate Helmet will cause a user's view to be diminished to a small rectangle.
Due to heavy plate armour suffering from increased fire damage, it can be countered by a flamethrower or incendiary ammo.

heavy.plate.jacket.name: 厚钢板夹克
heavy.plate.jacket.description:
A high-tier protective item that will protect the user from a large portion of the damage dealt by most sources at the price of a movement penalty. It will also amplify the effects of cold and heat damage on the player, making it a situational item.
This item also disables the ability to aim down sights on weapons.

heavy.plate.pants.name: 厚钢板长裤
heavy.plate.pants.description: An high-tier protective item that will protect the user from a large portion of the damage dealt by most sources at the price of a movement penalty. It will also amplify the effects of cold and heat damage on the player, making it a situational item.

scientistsuit_heavy.name: 一套以抗辐射橡胶制成的重型生化防护套装。
scientistsuit_heavy.description: A Heavy Scientist Suit worn by the heavy scientists which are spawned at the oil rigs. Unobtainable during normal gameplay, it can only be acquired through console by admins.

attire.hide.boots.name: 兽皮靴
attire.hide.boots.description: The Hide Boots fall smack in the middle-tier of footwear, offering superiority only in defense against animal attacks. They are still quite cheap, however, so it might be worth it to upgrade from the Burlap Shoes.

attire.hide.helterneck.name: 兽皮露背装
attire.hide.helterneck.description: Statistically identical to the burlap shirt in spite of its provocative display of the skin.

attire.hide.pants.name: 兽皮裤
attire.hide.pants.description: Superior bite resistance and inferior cold resistance is all that divides the hide pants from the burlap trousers. The limited availability of leather prompts most players to save it for boots, gloves, or higher-end armor.

attire.hide.poncho.name: 兽皮披肩
attire.hide.poncho.description: With lower resistances than any other item that takes up a torso armor slot, the Hide Poncho's only real advantage is the warmth it provides. Good for those living in tundra and mountain areas, or perhaps for a new player that happens to have a lot of extra leather.

attire.hide.skirt.name: 兽皮裙
attire.hide.skirt.description: Statistically equivalent to burlap trousers. Doesn't mesh very well with most torso attire.

attire.hide.vest.name: 兽皮背心
attire.hide.vest.description: While the hide vest is superior to the burlap shirt at deflecting animal attacks, the difference is hardly significant enough to entice players into prioritizing it.

horse.shoes.advanced.name: 高品质马蹄铁
horse.shoes.advanced.description: Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

hoodie.name: 连帽衫
hoodie.description: The hoodie offers the greatest projectile and melee resistance out of all the under armor variants. This superiority is offset by its high research and production cost.

horse.saddle.name: 马鞍
horse.saddle.description: Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

hab.armor.name: 热气球装甲
hab.armor.description: Armor for the Hot Air Balloon

mask.balaclava.name: 简易蒙面面罩
mask.balaclava.description: Essentially acting as an upgrade to the burlap headwrap, the balaclava's most distinguished aspect is its ability to resist cold. Because it is bound to containers and lacks stats significant enough to warrant researching, the balaclava is not often seen.

jacket.name: 夹克
jacket.description: Though not as widely employed as its wooden counterpart, the jacket bridges the gap dividing the aforementioned and road sign. It offers superior projectile resistance to its predecessors, and founds the melee resistance that will remain static up through to the metal chest plate.

largebackpack.name: 大背包
largebackpack.description: A large, military issued backpack that lets you carry 28 extra items.

burlap.gloves.name: 麻布制手套
burlap.gloves.description:
The minuscule damage reduction of the leather gloves is off-set by the tendency for the player to be shot in the chest rather than the legs, as well as the reduced cost in comparison to the boots.
As was described, the protection of the gloves extend to the rest of the chest as well.

frankensteins.monster.01.head.name: 轻型科学怪人头部
frankensteins.monster.01.head.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.01.legs.name: 轻型科学怪人腿部
frankensteins.monster.01.legs.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.01.torso.name: 轻型科学怪人身体
frankensteins.monster.01.torso.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

tshirt.long.name: 长袖T-Shirt
tshirt.long.description: Common torso attire sharing the same stats as the t-shirt. Default skin is very noticeable.

frankensteins.monster.02.head.name: 中型科学怪人头部
frankensteins.monster.02.head.description:
A balanced head.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.02.legs.name: 中型科学怪人腿部
frankensteins.monster.02.legs.description:
A balanced set of legs.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

frankensteins.monster.02.torso.name: 中型科学怪人身体
frankensteins.monster.02.torso.description:
A balanced torso.
Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

metal.plate.torso.name: 金属胸甲
metal.plate.torso.description: The metal chest plate is a versatile end-game armor used most often when roaming and raiding. Though high quality metal is often stored in abundance due to its limited use, players should begin making room for the sewing kits as this period comes into the horizon.

metal.facemask.name: 金属面罩
metal.facemask.description: A high-tier protective face mask which somehow protects the entire head. It costs High Quality Metal, making it quite expensive compared to its alternatives, but in return offers the greatest protection to almost all forms of physical damage in exchange for decreasing cold protection.

hat.miner.name: 矿工帽
hat.miner.description: The miner's hat is capable of doing all that the candle hat can, but with greater resistances to boot. It is, however, much easier to gauge where a player is looking if their light is on.

hazmatsuit_scientist_nvgm.name: 夜视科学家生化装
hazmatsuit_scientist_nvgm.description: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

attire.nesthat.name: 鸟巢帽
attire.nesthat.description: An extremely silly easter nest hat with googly eyes.

nightvisiongoggles.name: 夜视镜
nightvisiongoggles.description: Enables vision at nighttime by projecting and amplifying infrared light.The batteries can be recharged at a Lvl 2 workbench. Cannot be worn with a helmet.

hat.oxmask.name: 公牛面具
hat.oxmask.description: An Ox mask to celebrate the 2021 Lunar New Year.

pants.name: 裤子
pants.description: As the best available clothing for the legs the pants are a must-research.

parachute.name: Parachute (Deployed)
parachute.description: Once equipped, press [+jump] while in mid-air to pull the cord. Must be repacked after use. Must be at least 15m above the ground in order to deploy.

partyhat.name: 派对帽
partyhat.description: A very stupid looking party hat.

twitchsunglasses.name: 紫色墨镜
twitchsunglasses.description: Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

hat.rabbitmask.name: 兔面具
hat.rabbitmask.description: A Beautifully crafted Rabbit mask to celebrate the 2023 Lunar New Year

hat.ratmask.name: 老鼠面具
hat.ratmask.description: A Beautifully crafted bronze and gold Rat mask to celebrate the 2020 Lunar New Year

attire.reindeer.headband.name: 馴鹿鹿角
attire.reindeer.headband.description: The Reindeer Antlers are festive headgear that can be found in small presents. Its comparable to wearing Burlap Headwrap.

riot.helmet.name: 镇暴头盔
riot.helmet.description: A mid-tier helmet that protects the user's head. Made without the need for High-Quality-Metal, the helmet is an inexpensive form of protection that offers exceptional melee resistance and amicable projectile resistance. It comes in a rather form-fitting default black skin, which tends to camouflage rather well, with several other user skins in the same vein.

roadsign.jacket.name: 道路标志夹克
roadsign.jacket.description: The road sign jacket has become the staple of mid-game armor due primarily to its worthwhile projectile resistance without necessitating high quality metal.

roadsign.kilt.name: 道路标志短裙
roadsign.kilt.description: The lack of a metal chest plate or jacket equivalent to leg armor allows the road sign kilt a monopoly on both mid and end-game leg armor. Heavy plate pants are all that can surpass it statistically, but those are seldom seen outside of airlock brawls due to their movement penalty.

roadsign.gloves.name: 道路标志手套
roadsign.gloves.description: Gloves made out of metal offers a good amount of protection to the upper body.

horse.armor.roadsign.name: 道路标志牌马铠甲
horse.armor.roadsign.description: A set of roadsign armor for a horse

horse.saddlebag.name: 马鞍包
horse.saddlebag.description: Equipping this saddle bag will add extra storage space on your horse

santabeard.name: 圣诞老人胡子
santabeard.description: A santa beard. Ho Ho ho.

santahat.name: 圣诞老人帽
santahat.description: A santa hat that can be found in christmas presents during the end of the year.

scarecrow.suit.name: 稻草人套装
scarecrow.suit.description: An item that can only be spawned in the console menu by admins. Currently the icon appears to be a wetsuit but when it is on a character it will be the scarecrow NPC costume from the Halloween event.

hazmatsuit_scientist_peacekeeper.name: 科學家套裝
hazmatsuit_scientist_peacekeeper.description: A piece of clothing worn by the Scientist NPCs. Although it is an unobtainable item, it can be spawned in by an admin.

shirt.collared.name: 衬衫
shirt.collared.description: Container equivalent of hide vest. Meshes poorly with most leg attire. Default skin camouflages well at night.

pants.shorts.name: 短裤
pants.shorts.description: With identical stats to the burlap trousers and hide skirt in spite of its increased cloth cost, crafting the shorts is a choice of aesthetic over function.

horse.saddle.single.name: 单人马鞍
horse.saddle.single.description: A horse saddle with one seat. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

smallbackpack.name: Small Backpack
smallbackpack.description: A small, makeshift backpack that lets you carry 12 extra items.

jacket.snow.name: 雪夹克
jacket.snow.description: An article of clothing that takes up the chest slot for both clothes and armor. It is recommended for anyone who lives in the snow, though not being able to wear armor is very detrimental.

attire.snowman.helmet.name: 雪人头盔
attire.snowman.helmet.description: A snowman helmet which provides ample protection.

sunglasses.name: 太阳眼镜
sunglasses.description: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

halloween.surgeonsuit.name: 外科医生套装
halloween.surgeonsuit.description:
This surgeon suit is craftable if you own the item on Steam, and, in terms of ballistic protection, makes a great alternative for the Hazmat Suit due to not requiring a researched blueprint, and having a decent, mid-tier overall body protection in one piece, rather than separate pieces of clothing to cover all areas, for a relatively cheap crafting cost.
It has no real specialisation, other than a decent radiation protection (which still doesn't compete with the hazmat suit) that allows you to go in most places. Therefore, it's really just the fact it's a cool-looking surgeon suit, and offers fair overall protection.
For combat purposes, the Surgeon Scrubs positions itself in the mid-tier segment, directly next to armaments such as the Bone Armor kit, Hazmat Suit, and commonly put together clothes sets that lack any specialized pieces of armor.

tshirt.name: T-Shirt
tshirt.description: Same resistances as longsleeve t-shirt while being nowhere near as common.

tactical.gloves.name: 战术手套
tactical.gloves.description: Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.

shirt.tanktop.name: 背心
shirt.tanktop.description: The tank top offers inferior resistances at equivalent production cost when compared to the hide vest. Its only redeeming quality is that it can be found in crates, but its drop chance is pathetic even in that regard. If that wasn't enough, the burlap shirt also triumphs over this advanced piece of role player technology. If you do manage to come across one and are possessed into wanting to manufacture more, be prepared to cough up 75 scrap.

hat.tigermask.name: 老虎面具
hat.tigermask.description: A special tiger mask to celebrate Chinese New Year

diving.wetsuit.name: 潜水服
diving.wetsuit.description:
The Wetsuit is used for staying dry while swimming in water.
If a player is wearing a wetsuit, they will never get the 'WET' effect.
It is especially helpful for swimming in colder regions as it takes much longer to dry in the cold.
It also has a huge 15% radiation resistance which can be useful for new players in radtowns.

hat.wolf.name: 狼头饰
hat.wolf.description:
Scavenging the wolf skull necessary to produce this headdress won't be easy, but it pays for itself and then some with the resistances it grants; phenomenal melee and explosive protection, excellent projectile defense, and a pleasant resistance to cold makes this thing a primitive powerhouse.
If that weren't enough, its ability to combine with the bandana can push it even further beyond its already unbelievable state. Treasure these.

wood.armor.helmet.name: 木制头盔
wood.armor.helmet.description: Though not significant, the wood armor helmet differentiates itself from its cloth counterparts with its superior melee resistance.

wood.armor.pants.name: 木制腿甲
wood.armor.pants.description: The wood armor pants are a cheap, effective source of leg protection, uncontested in their role until the road sign kilt makes itself available. Though its projectile resistance is meager, it prospers in the early game as a melee meat shield.

wood.armor.jacket.name: 木制胸甲
wood.armor.jacket.description: Though the component cost may delay its acquisition by fresh players, those fortunate enough to utilize this armor will be satisfied by its ability to shrug off melee attacks.

horse.armor.wood.name: 木制马铠
horse.armor.wood.description: A set of wooden horse armor

tool.binoculars.name: 双筒望远镜
tool.binoculars.description: Binoculars are a cost-efficient way to spy on your unaware neighbors, or get a clear view of the surrounding land. They provide three levels of magnification (changed with the left mouse button), including one level far stronger than the zoom of a 4x scope. Cheap, easy to use, and can be a lifesaver when used by a smart and careful player.

cakefiveyear.name: 生日蛋糕
cakefiveyear.description: A very special and happy birthday to rust!

tool.camera.name: 照相机
tool.camera.description: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.

chainsaw.name: 电锯
chainsaw.description:
The Chainsaw is a somewhat rare harvesting tool which is an upgrade to the Hatchet and Salvaged Axe. It requires fuel to use, holding up to 50 at once, and must be revved up before it can be used. The chainsaw quickly cuts through trees, even if it doesn't hit the weak spot, and is very useful for gathering large amounts of wood quickly.
The chainsaw can also be used as a melee weapon or for cutting through constructions, but beware that it loses durability very fast when doing these tasks.

fishing.tackle.name: 钓鱼工具
fishing.tackle.description:
The Fishing Tackle is a quest item, it is found inside the fisherman's toolbox near the coast of the Fishing Village, it appears when you start the quest.
It currently has no use in game.

flare.name: 信号弹
flare.description:
Flare can be thrown on the ground to emit red light with large radius. Can be useful in darker areas. However, this can bring enemies to you as the red light is visible from far away.
Can be recycled for gunpowder.

flashlight.held.name: 手电筒
flashlight.held.description: A powerful flashlight which illuminates your surroundings and can be used as a weapon.

toolgun.name: Garry's Mod工具枪
toolgun.description:
Garry's Mod Tool Gun is a special tool that has the same functions as the Hammer, with slightly increased range and repairs faster.
It can be obtained by buying Garry's Mod on your current Steam account and play for at least 30 minutes.

geiger.counter.name: 盖革计数器
geiger.counter.description:
The Geiger Counter is a prop used by the Scientist NPC for scanning radiation.
This item cannot be obtained by player and can only be spawned by the admin.
The first person model shows the player holding a medical syringe and it has no function whatsoever.

hammer.name: 槌子
hammer.description: A tool used for rotating, repairing, and upgrading parts of structures. It can also be used to pick up certain deployable items.

fishingrod.handmade.name: 手工制作钓鱼竿
fishingrod.handmade.description:
Handmade Fishing Rod is a tool used to catch fishes as well as junks that might come in handy.
To use the Handmade Fishing Rod, hold RMB and cast out with LMB. Once you've got a bait ready to go simply aim at the water while holding RMB and cast out with LMB. Once you've got a bite, you'll need to reel in the fish. You can use A/D to pull left and right and S to reel the fish in.

hatchet.name: 铁斧
hatchet.description: This tool is a must-have for any Rust player. It is the most efficient tool when gathering wood and harvesting animals. Relatively cheap and durable, this tool should be what you aim for in the early stages of the game.

tool.instant_camera.name: 立可拍
tool.instant_camera.description: An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload. Photographs can be viewed by clicking on them in your inventory. Photographs can also be put into picture frames.

jackhammer.name: 电钻
jackhammer.description: Along with The Team System Update, the Jackhammer was the competitor, tool wise, to the chainsaw. It can be found in tool crates or sunken crates. It does not need fuel, and can be repaired at a repair bench or replenished at a workbench for no cost.

metal.detector.name: 金屬探測器
metal.detector.description: Detects metal objects which may otherwise be hidden. When the light flashes, or you hear a beep, aim to search for items. Increase the bar until a flag appears. Dig at the flag with a melee item to reveal what it is. Different areas yield different rewards. The metal detector does not work on safezones.

pickaxe.name: 十字镐
pickaxe.description: An improved gathering rate is offset by a significantly longer gather speed, though it is nonetheless considered far superior to its stone counterpart. It is as efficient as the salvaged ice pick but just a bit slower.

rf.detonator.name: 无线电发射器
rf.detonator.description: A hand held RF signal broadcaster. If transmit signal matches with RF Receiver, the Output of RF Receiver starts flowing power if broadcasted.

rock.name: 石头
rock.description:
The Rock is practically the mascot of Rust. As both a weapon and tool, every player starting with one must use it to initially collect resources and protect themselves from the environment before upgrading to superior utensils. The Rock, if broken, is very cheap to craft, costing only a few stones.
It is unarguably the least efficient tool and weapon in the game. With its low gather rates and slow speed, most players will desire to immediately upgrade to at least stone tools once they have acquired enough resources.

axe.salvaged.name: 圆斧
axe.salvaged.description: The Salvaged Axe is the upgraded version of the hatchet. It collects more wood and breaks down the trees faster. It has a slower swing speed than the hatchet so some people prefer the hatchet over it.

hammer.salvaged.name: 废料槌
hammer.salvaged.description:
Essentially an upgraded rock, the Salvaged Hammer is capable of gathering just about anything, but is not as good as an axe or pickaxe for gathering their respective resources.
The Salvaged Hammer is the best tool for quickly melee raiding the sheet metal door, taking only 28 minutes, 10 seconds and 24 salvaged hammers.

icepick.salvaged.name: 破冰镐
icepick.salvaged.description: The Salvaged Icepick distinguished itself from the pick line due to its superior gather speed at the cost of valuable components.

explosive.satchel.name: 小包炸药
explosive.satchel.description:
The Satchel Charge is a midgame raiding tool that can be used to destroy player-made buildings for the purpose of entering and looting another player's base.
The Satchel charge becomes armed when placed, has a random time until detonation, and has a small chance to malfunction, requiring the user to pick up and rearm the Charge. Note that sometimes the charge will re-ignite when the dud is picked up, going off with a very short fuse!

shovel.name: 鏟子
shovel.description: A shovel for digging up stuff

grenade.smoke.name: 烟雾弹
grenade.smoke.description:
The Smoke Grenade is a non-lethal canister-type grenade with many useful purposes. It creates a large cloud of thick grayish smoke that cannot be seen through. It can be used in various environments to cover you from enemy vision, forcing them to either shoot or reposition.
Best used in urban or wooded areas, where the flat surface will let it create the smoke screen.
It can be acquired from Outpost vending machines and crafted.

spraycan.name: 喷漆罐
spraycan.description: Use the Spray Can to leave Tags or reskin your items. Press [attack] to spray and [attack2] to reskin items.

stonehatchet.name: 石斧
stonehatchet.description: The Stone Hatchet is a primitive, early game tool used for collecting wood and flesh. It is available to craft, costing only wood and stones. Players starting out may find great use of the Stone Hatchet along with the Stone Pickaxe to aid in their farming endeavors. Although it is much less efficient than the Hatchet or Salvaged Axe, it is still used commonly due to its low barrier of entry- not costing any processed materials which require a furnace.

stone.pickaxe.name: 石镐
stone.pickaxe.description: Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore. Can also be used to harvest animals due to its relatively high harvest rate, and contrary to popular belief, it is more efficient than the stone hatchet.

supply.signal.name: 空投信号弹
supply.signal.description:
A purple smoke grenade that calls in an airdrop somewhere in a small radius around it. Can be found rarely in Military and Elite Crates.
When you use this item, it will release a purple smoke that can let players who in far away know that there are someone just call a airdrop. Cargo Plane will show somewhere in sky and will release the airdrop to your location shortly
Calling for airdrop to your base with high walls or monument (water pump stations, oilrig)is a right choice, because that other players won't steal your loot

surveycharge.name: 勘探装置
surveycharge.description:
A survey charge is a small explosive that is used to determine the mineral content of an area of ground. The survey charge is placed on the ground where it explodes and throws an amount of resources into the air. The resources thrown are directly proportional to the yield of a mining quarry when placed over the crater left by the survey charge. The impact crater can also be examined manually which will generate a note containing the numerical analysis of the minerals present.
The survey charge also deals damage in an area of affect upon explosion. While ineffective against players due to the fuse and low damage, it can be used to help raid sheet metal doors if they are available, and provide enough damage to not be worth recycling instead.

explosive.timed.name: 定时炸弹
explosive.timed.description:
The Timed Explosive Charge, mostly knowns as C4, is an item often used when raiding other players. Once thrown, the charge will stick to walls, floors, doors and deployable items.
Once attached to a target, the timed explosives will automatically detonate in a dependable and quick manner (in comparison to it's unreliable counterpart, the Satchel Charge). However, it does damage only to the structure it's attached to. If attached to a door, for example, it would destroy it without damaging the door frame or nearby walls.
This item deals the most damage out of all explosive devices, and is the most ideal/useful for evicting your neighbors. It's important to protect this item from your enemies, as it can prove fatal once it's in the wrong hands.

torch.name: 火把
torch.description:
The torch is one of two items that the player spawns into the world with, and though it finds occasional use in navigating through the dim of night and absolute darkness of the underground, it's abilities beyond that are questionable.
It is considered unwise to employ the torch in darkness unless absolutely necessary, as you mark yourself a target to any players within eyeshot.

bucket.water.name: 水桶
bucket.water.description: The water bucket is a useful motive for transporting liquid, however if it is stowed in the inventory, all of the contents will be emptied.

antiradpills.name: 抗辐射药丸
antiradpills.description:
Anti-Rad pills are used to remove radiation. Use them after you get radiation sickness not before you go into a radiation zone. Anti-Radiation pills can also be traded at the Bandit Camp for scrap.
Beware that radiation pills cause significant dehydration.

bandage.name: 绷带
bandage.description:
Bandages are crafted medical supplies that stop bleeding and heal a small amount of health.
It is common to chain-use bandages when the player has no access to other medical supplies, as hemp can be picked while running around the map and used for an easy health boost.

blood.name: 血液
blood.description: Blood is currently not used as a component in any item in Rust, and will not drop normally. It was formerly used to craft medical supplies. It may be re-implemented at a future time.

largemedkit.name: 大型医疗包
largemedkit.description:
The Large Medkit is medical supplies that stops bleeding when used, provides 10 instant health and heals to max health overtime. You can use the Large Medkit by pressing it on your Inventory and click the Use button or move it to your toolbar and press the slot key to use. It does not have an Use animation so bleeding can be stopped immediately.
As of July 2021, the Large Medkit can revive you with a chance of 100% while in Wounded state, it must be placed in your toolbar to be consumed. Your revival chance also depends on your Hunger and Hydration status, if both are full, they will give a total of 40% chance to revive you.

syringe.medical.name: 医疗注射器
syringe.medical.description:
The Medical Syringe is the best medical supply used for combat situations. It instant heals you a portion of your health and slowly heals the rest. It also reduces your radiation poisoning which is very useful while navigating the red puzzle building with high levels of radiation.
As of July 2021, the Medical Syringe can be used to revive people in Wounded state. It revives faster than holding E on the wounded player, however this gives you a disadvantage to look around and spot enemies as you will cancel the heal animation.

radiationresisttea.advanced.name: 二级去辐射茶
radiationresisttea.advanced.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

healingtea.advanced.name: 二级治疗茶
healingtea.advanced.description: A tea that restores health over time.

maxhealthtea.advanced.name: 二级最大生命茶
maxhealthtea.advanced.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

oretea.advanced.name: 二级矿茶
oretea.advanced.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

radiationremovetea.advanced.name: 二级去辐射茶
radiationremovetea.advanced.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

scraptea.advanced.name: 二级废料茶
scraptea.advanced.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

woodtea.advanced.name: 二级木茶
woodtea.advanced.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

fish.anchovy.name: 鳀鱼
fish.anchovy.description: A small bony fish commonly found in large schools.

radiationresisttea.name: 一级抗辐射茶
radiationresisttea.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

apple.name: 苹果
apple.description: The apple is a food that gives the player food and water. Unlike most other foods the apple gives lots more hydration when consumed. Can be found in food crates and medical crates.

healingtea.name: 一级治疗茶
healingtea.description: A tea that restores health over time.

maxhealthtea.name: 一级最大生命茶
maxhealthtea.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

oretea.name: 一级矿茶
oretea.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

scraptea.name: 一级废料茶
scraptea.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

woodtea.name: 一级木茶
woodtea.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

clone.black.berry.name: 黑莓殖株
clone.black.berry.description: A clipping of a Black Berry Plant.

seed.black.berry.name: 黑色莓果种子
seed.black.berry.description:
These black berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

black.raspberries.name: 黑色覆盆子
black.raspberries.description: Black Raspberries provide a large amount of health and hydration when compared to other foods, but they can only be found in monuments in food crates (not to be confused with ration boxes) making them hard to come by.

blue.berry.name: 蓝莓
blue.berry.description: A blue berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.blue.berry.name: 蓝莓殖株
clone.blue.berry.description: A clipping of a Blue Berry Plant.

seed.blue.berry.name: 蓝色莓果种子
seed.blue.berry.description:
These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

blueberries.name: 蓝莓
blueberries.description: A rare food item acquired from food crates (not to be confused with ration boxes) found in monuments randomly. They restore one 1/10th of your health and give a balanced amount hydration and calories. Just like the black raspberries, they are best to be used during combat, additionally as supplements to a medical syringe to greatly improve the healing received.

bearmeat.burned.name: 烧焦的熊肉
bearmeat.burned.description: Burnt Bear Meat is the product of overcooking Bear Meat inside of a Campfire or a Barbecue. Consuming the meat will slightly increase your health and hunger.

chicken.burned.name: 烧焦的鸡肉
chicken.burned.description: Burnt Chicken is obtained by overcooking Raw Chicken Breast. It is still edible without being harmed.

deermeat.burned.name: 烧焦的鹿肉
deermeat.burned.description: Burned Deer Meat Eating it will damage your health.

horsemeat.burned.name: 烧焦的马肉
horsemeat.burned.description: Burned horse. Eating it will damage your health.

humanmeat.burned.name: 烧焦的人肉
humanmeat.burned.description: Burnt Human Meat is made by overcooking Human Meat. It is not recommended to eat due to the high cost in hydration for a negligible boost to hunger. Should be thrown away unless the player is extremely desperate for food, and has access to a large/infinite amount of water.

meat.pork.burned.name: 烧焦的猪肉
meat.pork.burned.description: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long.

wolfmeat.burned.name: 烧焦的狼肉
wolfmeat.burned.description: Burned Wolf Meat is the product of overcooking meat in a camp fire. Consuming it will damage your health, as with all other burnt meats.

cactusflesh.name: 仙人掌果肉
cactusflesh.description: Cactus flesh can be harvested from Cacti with an axe or rock. They provide little food value, however they give much needed hydration in the desert.

can.beans.name: 豆子罐头
can.beans.description: Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

can.tuna.name: 鲔鱼罐头
can.tuna.description: Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

candycane.name: 拐杖糖
candycane.description: The Candy Cane is a festive item, it can be obtained only from food crates during a Christmas event. While uncommon, when found the Candy Cane is a great food source as two will fully fill the hunger bar.

fish.catfish.name: 鳀鱼
fish.catfish.description: A large, whiskered fresh water based predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

chocolate.name: 巧克力棒
chocolate.description: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

bearmeat.cooked.name: 煮熟的熊肉
bearmeat.cooked.description: Delicious Bear Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

chicken.cooked.name: 煮熟的鸡肉
chicken.cooked.description: Cooked chicken is obtained by cooking Raw Chicken Breast. You can eat it to restore hunger and a little bit of hydration.

deermeat.cooked.name: 煮熟的鹿肉
deermeat.cooked.description: Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

fish.cooked.name: 煮熟的鱼肉
fish.cooked.description: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

horsemeat.cooked.name: 煮熟的马肉
horsemeat.cooked.description: Cooked Horse Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

humanmeat.cooked.name: 煮熟的人肉
humanmeat.cooked.description: Cooked Human Meat is gathered by cooking Raw Human Meat. Eating it results in gain of calories but as a disadvantage loss of hydration. It is recommended to only eat it if you have a good water source.

meat.pork.cooked.name: 煮熟的猪肉
meat.pork.cooked.description: Cooked pork, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

wolfmeat.cooked.name: 煮熟的狼肉
wolfmeat.cooked.description: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

corn.name: 玉米
corn.description: An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst. Can be found at rivers and sold at Bandit Camp for 10 scrap per 15 corns.

clone.corn.name: 玉米克隆
clone.corn.description: A Clipping of a Corn Plant.

seed.corn.name: 玉米种子
seed.corn.description:
Corn seeds can be found when picking wild Corn plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster growth.

granolabar.name: 杂粮棒
granolabar.description: Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

green.berry.name: 绿莓果
green.berry.description: A green berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.green.berry.name: 绿莓殖株
clone.green.berry.description: A clipping of a Green Berry Plant.

seed.green.berry.name: 绿色莓果种子
seed.green.berry.description:
These green berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

grub.name: 幼虫
grub.description: A pale, fleshy insect that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

clone.hemp.name: 大麻克隆
clone.hemp.description: A clipping of a hemp plant.

seed.hemp.name: 大麻种子
seed.hemp.description:
Hemp seeds are a secondary product when collecting hemp plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth. A common practice is to plant them immediately after harvesting out in the world so that other new players can get cloth from it later on.
If they are planted in the ground, watering them has no effect, and you are not able to use fertilizer on them. This means that they are lower maintenance, but you have no control over the quality of the soil, so they will typically grow more slowly.
However, if you plant them in a planter box (small or large), they will require you to regularly water them and keep them stocked with fertilizer for maximum growth efficiency. Be careful not to over-water them, or efficiency may go back down a bit. Generally a good amount of water to have is somewhere between 50% and 70% capacity.
The plant needs light to grow, whether from a lamp or the sun. As of May 2020, floor grates do not let light through to the plant, despite looking like they do. This is likely a bug and may be fixed in the future. With the new electric water pump and electric water purifier, it is a good idea to build either on the beach or on a river (with one lower or missing foundation for safe access to water), as you can set up automatic plant watering fairly easily.

fish.herring.name: 鲱鱼
fish.herring.description: A small fish commonly found in a variety of water sources.

fish.minnows.name: 吻仔鱼
fish.minnows.description: Small fish caught by fish trap

mushroom.name: 蘑菇
mushroom.description: Mushrooms can be found in forest and snow biomes and offer some decent healing properties. Although when eaten they don't provide many calories, they can be found in abundance in brown areas viable in the in-game map. Mushrooms will restore a portion of the consumer's health instantly, making them useful for early-game PvP.

fish.orangeroughy.name: 大西洋胸棘鲷
fish.orangeroughy.description: A rare fish found in the depths of the ocean. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

jar.pickle.name: 泡菜
jar.pickle.description: Pickles are edible food. However, you have a chance of getting your hunger and hydration decreased (you'll hear a vomit sound). It is recommended you save up pickles to feed horses, use as a bait for fish traps or compost for fertilizers.

clone.potato.name: 馬鈴薯克隆
clone.potato.description: A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

seed.potato.name: 马铃薯种子
seed.potato.description:
These potato seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

pumpkin.name: 南瓜
pumpkin.description:
The Pumpkin provides a great amount of calories, hydration, and healing compared to the other foods. It can also be worn on your head. When high durability, seeds are dropped when consumed. With the plant giving 3 harvests, they prove to be an easy to farm foodstuff giving massive returns.
Can be found on the sides of streams.

clone.pumpkin.name: 南瓜株克隆
clone.pumpkin.description:
A Clipping of a pumpkin plant.
Pumpkin Clones/Cuttings are collected by holding -E- on a 65% grown pumpkin plant

seed.pumpkin.name: 南瓜种子
seed.pumpkin.description: When planted, the pumpkin plant gives 3 harvests before being unusable. With this, it makes it easy to farm and mass produce, with farms growing exponentially through gameplay.

radiationresisttea.pure.name: 三级去辐射茶
radiationresisttea.pure.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

healingtea.pure.name: 三级治疗茶
healingtea.pure.description: A tea that restores health over time.

maxhealthtea.pure.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

oretea.pure.name: 三级矿茶
oretea.pure.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

radiationremovetea.pure.name: 三级去辐射茶
radiationremovetea.pure.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

scraptea.pure.name: 三级废料茶
scraptea.pure.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

woodtea.pure.name: 三级木茶
woodtea.pure.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

radiationremovetea.name: 一级去辐射茶
radiationremovetea.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

bearmeat.name: 生熊肉
bearmeat.description: Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

chicken.raw.name: 生鸡胸肉
chicken.raw.description: Raw Chicken Breast is obtained by killing and harvesting a chicken. It is recommended to cook before eating.

deermeat.raw.name: 生鹿肉
deermeat.raw.description: Raw Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

horsemeat.raw.name: 生马肉
horsemeat.raw.description: Raw Horse Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

humanmeat.raw.name: 生人肉
humanmeat.raw.description: Raw Human Meat is gathered by hitting a dead body with a weapon. it is not recommended to eat unless you cook it in a campfire first.

meat.boar.name: 生猪肉
meat.boar.description: Raw pork. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

wolfmeat.raw.name: 生狼肉
wolfmeat.raw.description: Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

red.berry.name: 红莓果
red.berry.description: a red berry, used in the making of various types of tea.

clone.red.berry.name: 红莓殖株
clone.red.berry.description: A clipping of a Red Berry Plant.

seed.red.berry.name: 红色莓果种子
seed.red.berry.description:
These red berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

apple.spoiled.name: 腐烂的苹果
apple.spoiled.description: A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

fish.salmon.name: 鲑鱼
fish.salmon.description: A large Salmon, found in fresh and salt water. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.sardine.name: 沙丁鱼
fish.sardine.description: A small oily fish, commonly found in large schools.

fish.smallshark.name: 小鲨鱼
fish.smallshark.description: A small, surprisingly aggressive deep sea predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.troutsmall.name: 小鳟鱼
fish.troutsmall.description: A fish, edible after being gutted and cooked. Obtainable by putting large bait in a fish trap.

smallwaterbottle.name: 小水瓶
smallwaterbottle.description:
The Water Bottle found in trash piles, and is used for the collection and transportation of drinkable water.
To fill, equip it and right click while looking at a source of water. You can then drink from it whenever you desire with a left click (make sure the water in the bottle is freshwater and not salt/stagnant water).
If the water in the pouch is not desired, or if you are attempting to extinguish a fire (not napalm), you can right click on the bottle again to dump it's contents.

chicken.spoiled.name: 腐烂的鸡肉
chicken.spoiled.description: Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

humanmeat.spoiled.name: 腐烂的人肉
humanmeat.spoiled.description: Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

wolfmeat.spoiled.name: 腐烂的狼肉
wolfmeat.spoiled.description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

supertea.name: 超级血清
supertea.description: Super Serum, more ore, more wood, more scrap

waterjug.name: 塑胶水桶
waterjug.description:
The water jug is an item which carries water and can be held in the players hot-bar or inventory.
The water jug is far superior to the water bucket because of its extra 1,000 ml capacity and its ability to hold water while not in the hands of the user. It is most commonly used in large numbers to carry massive amounts of water to a players base in one trip. It is highly recommended that you have multiple of these items if you plan to have any kind of indoor farm because of the water bonus to farming.

white.berry.name: 白莓果
white.berry.description: A white berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.white.berry.name: 白莓殖株
clone.white.berry.description: A clipping of a White Berry Plant.

seed.white.berry.name: 白色莓果种子
seed.white.berry.description:
These white berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

worm.name: 蚯蚓
worm.description: A small, writhing worm that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

yellow.berry.name: 黄莓果
yellow.berry.description: A yellow berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.yellow.berry.name: 黄莓殖株
clone.yellow.berry.description: A clipping of a Yellow Berry Plant.

seed.yellow.berry.name: 黄色莓果种子
seed.yellow.berry.description:
These yellow berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.
Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

fish.yellowperch.name: 黄鲈鱼
fish.yellowperch.description: A Yellow Perch, commonly found in freshwater rivers.

ammo.shotgun.name: 12号霰弹
ammo.shotgun.description:
12 Gauge Buckshot is a type shotgun ammunition that fires a wide spread of 14 low-damage pellets. Regardless of the weapon it is fired out of, it is extremely lethal in close quarters, capable of one-shotting fully geared players at point-blank.
12 Gauge buckshot has fewer pellets than the Handmade Shell, but makes up for it by doing much more damage with each pellet.

ammo.shotgun.fire.name: 12号燃烧霰弹
ammo.shotgun.fire.description: The 12 gauge incendiary shell is a new shotgun ammunition as of Devblog 198. Once fired, unlike any other shell, it will spew out flaming shotgun projectiles. If stepped on, the player that walks over it will take fire damage. The flame projectile sparks rather than flame when the projectile hit the target.

ammo.shotgun.slug.name: 12号独头弹
ammo.shotgun.slug.description: 12 Gauge Slug is a type of shotgun ammunition that fires a single, high-damage projectile. 12 Gauge Slug is most useful for when the user seeks to significantly extend the range of their shotgun at the cost of decreased lethality in close-quarters and requiring more precise aim to land a hit.

ammo.grenadelauncher.buckshot.name: 40毫米霰弹枪
ammo.grenadelauncher.buckshot.description: The 40mm shotgun round is an ammunition type for the Multiple Grenade Launcher. It fires a wide spread of 12 pellets that can do a massive amount of damage at close range, being able to one-shot a fully geared player if all pellets connect.

ammo.grenadelauncher.smoke.name: 40毫米烟雾弹
ammo.grenadelauncher.smoke.description: Ammunition for a 40mm Grenade Launcher. Produces a cloud of smoke when fired.

ammo.rifle.name: 5.56步枪子弹
ammo.rifle.description: Standard high powered ammunition, used by any rifle in the game currently. Offers superior damage, range, accuracy, damage drop off and air resistance from the Pistol Bullet.

arrow.bone.name: 骨头箭
arrow.bone.description: A slower, less damaging arrow that is easier to hit people with.

ammo.rifle.explosive.name: 5.56爆炸步枪子弹
ammo.rifle.explosive.description:
A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The Explosive 5.56 round deals a small amount of additional explosion damage to a player upon direct impact as well as damaging nearby structures or players.
The round is effective against low-tier structures such as Wood walls and Sheet Metal doors.

arrow.fire.name: 火焰箭
arrow.fire.description:
Low-velocity high-damage equivalent to the wooden arrows. Emits a fiery area of effect near its point of impact which will damage and slow anyone in its radius. In combat this can deny both a push and a retreat.
As a raid tool it's faster and quieter than the eoka. Unlike the flamethrower, the fire it spreads won't damage structures.

ammo.rifle.hv.name: 5.56高速步枪子弹
ammo.rifle.hv.description: A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The High Velocity (HV) 5.56 round will travel faster than the standard round at a more expensive crafting cost. The round experiences little bullet drop. This type of ammo is best used with Bolt Action Rifle and L96 Rifle.

ammo.pistol.hv.name: 高速手枪子弹
ammo.pistol.hv.description:
The high velocity pistol ammo is used by pistols and submachine guns.
Its notable differences from regular pistol ammo include faster bullet travel and increased crafting cost.

ammo.handmade.shell.name: 手工子弹
ammo.handmade.shell.description:
The handmade shell is an early-game shotgun ammunition that fires a spread of 20 low-damage pellets. It's highly damaging in close quarters, but its lethality quickly drops off as range increases.
In comparison to 12 gauge buckshot, the handmade shell has significantly more pellets, but less damage overall.

arrow.hv.name: 高速箭矢
arrow.hv.description: The high velocity arrow is one of four ammo types for the crossbow, compound bow, and the bow. It can be shot further and faster than the normal arrow, however, it causes less damage.

ammo.rocket.hv.name: 高速火箭弹
ammo.rocket.hv.description: The High Velocity Rocket is essentially a rocket with much less damage than the standard rocket. However, it is also much cheaper, and as the name suggests it has a higher velocity than the standard rocket, so it could be useful for rocketing targets at extreme range. Because of its lower cost and damage, it is useful for situations where a full rocket would be overkill.

ammo.rocket.seeker.name: 追踪导弹
ammo.rocket.seeker.description: Fast moving rocket ammunition. Uses a type of radar for active target guidance from a Homing Launcher

ammo.rifle.incendiary.name: 5.56燃烧步枪子弹
ammo.rifle.incendiary.description: A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The 5.56 Incendiary round will ignite on impact dealing both bullet and fire damage to a player. The round is however subject to increased bullet drop.

ammo.pistol.fire.name: 燃烧手枪子弹
ammo.pistol.fire.description: Slower, slightly more effective pistol bullet that also deals fire damage. Useful against Heavy Plate armor.

ammo.rocket.fire.name: 燃烧火箭弹
ammo.rocket.fire.description: Incendiary rockets spread flames over the area of impact, dealing fire damage to its surroundings. It deals heavy damage to wooden structures and turrets. They can also be used effectively to trap and kill players in an enclosed space.

ammo.rocket.mlrs.name: 多管火箭弹
ammo.rocket.mlrs.description: The MLRS Rocket is a projectile for the MLRS, they are found in Locked Crates as well as the MLRS Aiming Module. It has lethal damage to both structures and players. 3 SAM Sites can easily destroy the projectiles.

ammo.nailgun.nails.name: 钉枪钉子
ammo.nailgun.nails.description: Early game cheap and easy to acquire ammo for the Nailgun. Has a unique trajectory and velocity that is worse than regular arrows shot from a Hunting Bow, thus giving it a really small effective range. Work best up close and not beyond 10 meters.

ammo.pistol.name: 手枪子弹
ammo.pistol.description: Standard ammunition for pistols and submachine guns.

ammo.rocket.basic.name: 火箭弹
ammo.rocket.basic.description:
In Rust, rockets are the ammunition for rocket launchers, rockets will cause splash damage that can hit up to 4 walls at once. This type of ammunition is particularly effective against buildings.
In terms of trajectory, rockets are launched forward with a considerable speed upon firing. However, the trajectory eventually falls off due to the in-game gravity effect.
Rockets are currently one of the best tools for raiding and destroying buildings. Rockets are also deadly against players due to its high damage and range of splash damage.

ammo.rocket.sam.name: 对空导弹弹药
ammo.rocket.sam.description: Ammunition for a Sam Site, This missile contains a rudimentary guidance system to help it navigate through strong winds.

ammo.rocket.smoke.name: 正在開發的煙霧火箭彈!!!!
ammo.rocket.smoke.description: Currently, smoke rockets in Rust are labeled as WIP (Work In Progress). They do minor poison damage to players or to structures, and provide minimal amounts of quickly disappearing smoke. Though they are cannot currently be crafted or found, admins are able to spawn them in via the console.

submarine.torpedo.straight.name: 鱼雷
submarine.torpedo.straight.description:
Ammunition for both submarine types. Fires in a straight line. Used to be called Direct Torpedo.
As of September 2021's update, the Surface Torpedo was removed from the game due to players camping underwater with little to no risk. The Direct Torpedo was then renamed to Torpedo.

arrow.wooden.name: 木箭
arrow.wooden.description: The Wooden Arrow is one of four ammo types for the crossbow and the bow. It has lower range and velocity than the High Velocity Arrow, but it does more damage compared to it.

flameturret.name: 火焰炮塔
flameturret.description:
The flame turret is a unique item that is difficult to find many applications for. It mostly finds it's way into 'trap bases', where a player is locked in a tight space and is burnt to a crisp by this monster.
It functions similarly to an Auto-Turret, activating only when a player without building privilege wanders in front of it. It then rotates rapidly, spewing a wall of flame in about a 30° angle in the general direction of the target until the target is dead or gone.
The flame turret is fueled by low grade fuel, and has a relatively short range to it's flames. Thus, this is a trap that requires a fair bit of planning for you to make good use of, but can be a powerful ally if you do.

trap.landmine.name: 自制地雷
trap.landmine.description: A small explosive device which activates when a player steps off the pressure plate. The land mine can be deactivated by a friend by hold 'Use' button (default 'E') on it so that the player can step off safely.

samsite.name: 对空导弹站
samsite.description:
The SAM Site targets any air vehicles (minicopter, scrap helicopter and hot air balloon, even TC authorized players with air vehicles) in range and shoots SAM ammo at the targeted vehicle. They will also target at MLRS rockets, 3 SAM sites are recommended for maximum MLRS protection.
It is recommended to have a RF Transmitter or a Smart Switch paired on your phone to toggle the SAM site if you have air vehicles.
As of February 2022, the SAM site has a Defender Mode that only targets MLRS rockets but not air vehicles. This allows you to still use your minicopters, but never friendly fired by your own SAM sites.

guntrap.name: 霰弹枪陷阱
guntrap.description: An entry-level turret crafted from easy to acquire components and resources. Activated by anyone within it's line of sight that does not have building privilege. Loaded with handmade shells, and can fire them independently without player intervention. Handy for protecting airlocks, or trap bases.

trap.bear.name: 捕兽夹
trap.bear.description:
The Snap Trap is a small anti-personnel trap used to wound a player. The trap can be deactivated for safe passage by hitting/shooting the middle causing the trap to slam shut making it harmless.
They can be picked back up once triggered if you have building privilege.

spikes.floor.name: 木头地刺
spikes.floor.description: The Wooden floor spikes are a basic anti-personnel trap. They are placed on the ground and will slow a player that travels through them as well as inflicting damage.

keycard_blue.name: 蓝色钥匙卡
keycard_blue.description:
The Blue Keycard is a game object required in order to access quite a lot of monument puzzles.
It can be obtained by fishing and gutting high tier fish or by completing green monument puzzles on Harbors, Satellite Dish or Sewer Branch.
List of monuments that require Blue Keycard to finish monument puzzle:
Airfield, Arctic Research Base, Military Tunnels, Missile Silo, Oil Rig, Power Plant, Trainyard, Water Treatment
Large Oil Rig does not require Blue Keycard to access Locked Crate but it grants access to 4 military crates.

easter.bronzeegg.name: 铜蛋
easter.bronzeegg.description: A Bronze Egg. Open for a surprise or collect 10 to upgrade to a silver egg.

captainslog.name: 船長日誌
captainslog.description: A deteriorating piece of paper with information relating to the last moments of this vessel.

coffin.storage.name: 棺材
coffin.storage.description: An old wooden coffin, can store up to 42 items.

cursedcauldron.name: 万圣节造型营火
cursedcauldron.description: A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.

xmas.decoration.baubels.name: 装饰彩球
xmas.decoration.baubels.description: Decorative Baubels you can hang on your Christmas tree.

xmas.decoration.gingerbreadmen.name: 装饰用姜饼人
xmas.decoration.gingerbreadmen.description: Decorative Gingerbread Men you can hang on your Christmas tree.

xmas.decoration.pinecone.name: 装饰用松果
xmas.decoration.pinecone.description: Decorative Pinecones you can hang on your Christmas tree.

xmas.decoration.candycanes.name: 装饰用塑胶拐杖糖
xmas.decoration.candycanes.description: Decorative Plastic Candy Canes you can hang on your Christmas tree.

xmas.decoration.tinsel.name: 装饰用金箔
xmas.decoration.tinsel.description: Decorative Tinsel you can hang on your Christmas tree.

door.key.name: 门钥匙
door.key.description:
Door keys are used in conjunction with a Key Lock for letting others access (open and close) your door.
Important: the person who places a Key Lock, has access by default, without the need for a door key.
If the key is lost, then the person carrying it won't have access anymore. In addition, if their killer or anyone else loots it from them and are able to locate the base, your base (or the particular door) might be compromised. So overall, carrying door keys outside of your base is risky.
To avoid this risk, it's advised to upgrade to Code Locks if you have multiple people that need to have access to your doors. Using keylocks within groups is really not practical, they are mostly used by solo players.

easterbasket.name: 彩蛋篮子
easterbasket.description: An easter egg basket. Equip to pick up eggs during an easter egg hunt with left click. Use right click to throw Painted Eggs that deal splash damage.

fogmachine.name: Fogger-3000
fogmachine.description: A Fog machine which runs on low grade fuel. Can be set to fill an area with a dense fog or triggered by motion.

giantcandycanedecor.name: 巨型糖果装饰
giantcandycanedecor.description: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane.

giantlollipops.name: 巨型棒棒糖装饰
giantlollipops.description: Get into the holiday spirit with these decorative giant lollipops.

easter.goldegg.name: 金蛋
easter.goldegg.description: A Gold Egg. Containing the best easter loot.

gravestone.name: 墓碑
gravestone.description: A Gravestone marking the remains of an unknown soul.

keycard_green.name: 绿色钥匙卡
keycard_green.description:
The Green Keycard is a required object used to open doors with a glowing green keycard lock.
It can be found in the Lighthouse, Oxum's Gas Station, Junkyard, and Abandoned Supermarket. They spawn on desks which you can find throughout the monuments.
It can then be used on the Satellite Dish, Harbors and the Sewer Branch. These keycard locks will require an electric fuse.

halloween.candy.name: 万圣节糖果
halloween.candy.description: Some loose halloween candy Collect 10 to upgrade to a Small Loot Bat!

head.bag.name: Head Bag
head.bag.description: A sack containing the head of a defeated foe. Can be added to trophies.

halloween.lootbag.large.name: 大型万圣节礼袋
halloween.lootbag.large.description: A massive haul. Contains the best halloween loot

xmas.present.large.name: 大型礼物
xmas.present.large.description: Large Presents are a consumable, seasonal item that can only be found on the Christmas season. Upon consuming the item the player will be rewarded with high value items

halloween.lootbag.medium.name: 中型万圣节礼袋
halloween.lootbag.medium.description: Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a Large loot bag, containing the best loot

xmas.present.medium.name: 中型礼物
xmas.present.medium.description: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present.

note.name: 笔记
note.description:
A note which can have letters written on but not notes. When a note is done being written on the player may place it in a container or leave it in their inventory. Useful for conveying messages to other players or raiders.
Notes are the only items that may be placed inside of mailboxes, and are handy for keeping in contact with friendly neighbors.

easter.paintedeggs.name: 彩蛋
easter.paintedeggs.description: Some simple painted eggs. Collect 10 to upgrade to a bronze egg

photo.name: 照片
photo.description: A photograph taken with an instant camera.

pumpkinbasket.name: 南瓜桶
pumpkinbasket.description: A pumpkin basket to help you collect candy much faster during Trick or Treat events with left click. Use right click to throw candy

keycard_red.name: 红色钥匙卡
keycard_red.description:
Red Keycard is a required object used to open doors with a red keycard lock. Elite crates start to spawn in red puzzle rooms. However, you will have to start to pull guns out as these red puzzle rooms are always guarded.
It can be obtained in the Water Treatment Plant, Airfield, Power Plant, and Trainyard. They are located on the desks.
It can then be used on:
- Military Tunnels (requires an electric fuse, a blue keycard and a red keycard, the green keycard is optional as it only unlocks another path into the monument. You will encounter scientists that throw F1 Grenades, so prepare medical items and weapons)
- Launch Site (requires 2 electric fuses, a green keycard and a red keycard. You will only encounter Bradley APC, which is not a big problem if you hide from it. Do bring medical items as the radiation inside the building is very high, your hazmat suit will decrease the radiation poisoning but not all)
- Small / Large Oil Rig (requires a red keycard, but in Small Oil Rig, bring a blue keycard to get to the red puzzle door. You will encounter scientists as well as heavy scientists (if you hack the locked crate), bring medical items and weapons)
- Underwater Labs (requires an electric fuse and a red keycard)

rustige_egg_b.name: Rustigé Egg - 藍色
rustige_egg_b.description: A beautiful hand-crafted egg made of sapphire and white gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the light house monument and plays a song while open.

rustige_egg_e.name: Rustigé Egg - 綠色
rustige_egg_e.description: A beautiful hand crafted gold and green egg, with a miniature traincart contained inside.

rustige_egg_d.name: Rustigé Egg - 象牙色
rustige_egg_d.description: An beautiful hand-crafted egg made of ivory and gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the satellite dish monument and plays a song while open.

rustige_egg_c.name: Rustigé Egg - 紫色
rustige_egg_c.description: A beautiful hand-crafted egg with gold lace. It contains a miniature arrangement of the oil rig monument (with circling Chinook) and plays a song while open.

rustige_egg_a.name: Rustigé Egg - Red
rustige_egg_a.description: An exquisite hand-crafted egg made of diamond and gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the dome monument and plays a song while open.

rustige_egg_f.name: Rustigé Egg - 白色
rustige_egg_f.description: A beautiful hand crafted gold and white egg, with a miniature underwater lab scene contained inside.

sickle.name: 镰刀
sickle.description: A very sharp curved cutting weapon. While its traditional role was to cut grass, this tool is also extremely versatile at cutting throats, perhaps trees, too.

easter.silveregg.name: 银蛋
easter.silveregg.description: A Silver Egg. Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a gold Egg

halloween.lootbag.small.name: 小型万圣节礼袋
halloween.lootbag.small.description: Open for a surprise, or collect 10 to upgrade to a medium loot bag containing better loot!

xmas.present.small.name: 小型礼物
xmas.present.small.description: A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present.

snowmachine.name: 造雪机
snowmachine.description: A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.

spiderweb.name: 蜘蛛网
spiderweb.description: Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.

spookyspeaker.name: 诡异音响
spookyspeaker.description: Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!

xmas.decoration.star.name: 圣诞星
xmas.decoration.star.description: A golden star to top off your Christmas Tree.

strobelight.name: 频闪灯
strobelight.description: A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.

xmas.decoration.lights.name: 树灯
xmas.decoration.lights.description: A tree isn't complete without colorful lights!

woodcross.name: 木制十字架
woodcross.description: A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul.

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.armored.name: 装甲驾驶舱模组
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.armored.description: Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

vehicle.1mod.passengers.armored.name: 装甲乘客模组
vehicle.1mod.passengers.armored.description: Single module armored seating for two passengers.

bleach.name: 漂白水
bleach.description: Bleach is only obtainable through the console with sufficient permissions. It currently has no use.

weapon.mod.burstmodule.name: 三连发枪机
weapon.mod.burstmodule.description: Forces the weapon to fire in 3 round bursts.

vehicle.2mod.camper.name: 露营车模组
vehicle.2mod.camper.description:
The Camper Vehicle Module is a dual module camper that can be fitted into a 3 Module Vehicle or a 4 Module Vehicle (does not come with a cockpit with engine), containing 4 sleeping bags, a barbeque, a locker and a small storage box.
By claiming a bed inside the camper, you can respawn on it and has the same respawn cooldown as the sleeping bag. The locker, barbeque and small storage box can also be used for storage, kits and more. It acts as a portable sleeping bag as you can drive it anywhere and respawn on it (except for safe zones).

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.name: 驾驶舱模组
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.description: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.with.engine.name: 自带引擎车辆模组的驾驶舱
vehicle.1mod.cockpit.with.engine.description: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.

ducttape.name: 胶带
ducttape.description: Duct Tape: Currently not used with any or has any use/purpose within the game at the current moment. Maybe FacePunch will give it a use at a later time.

fuse.name: 保險絲
fuse.description: The Electric Fuse is a required item for monument puzzle rooms. It must be placed in the fuse box in order to power the keycard lock. Recycling the electric fuse also gives some quick scrap.

propanetank.name: 空的瓦斯桶
propanetank.description: Tank used in crafting of the flamethrower and water purifier. Also can be recycled as a decent source of metal fragments.

vehicle.2mod.fuel.tank.name: 油罐车模组
vehicle.2mod.fuel.tank.description: Dual module large fuel tank. Useful for transporting water over large distances.

gears.name: 齿轮
gears.description:
Gears are used in the crafting of various desirable (building) supplies involved in base defense, such as traps, gates, and first and foremost armored & garage doors, which are significantly stronger than sheet metal doors.
These are hard to come by in large quantities and are one of the more sought after items in the game.

glue.name: 胶水
glue.description: A sticky white substance that at this point in time has no real functions. Only players with access to the console (i.e Admin, owner, mod) can spawn it.

carburetor3.name: 高品质化油器
carburetor3.description: A high quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

crankshaft3.name: 高品质曲轴
crankshaft3.description: A high quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

piston3.name: 高品质活塞
piston3.description: High quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

sparkplug3.name: 高品质火星塞
sparkplug3.description: High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

valve3.name: 高品质气阀
valve3.description: High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

carburetor1.name: 低品质化油器
carburetor1.description: A low quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

crankshaft1.name: 低品质曲轴
crankshaft1.description: A low quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

piston1.name: 低品质活塞
piston1.description: Low quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

sparkplug1.name: 低品质火星塞
sparkplug1.description: Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

valve1.name: 低品质气阀
valve1.description: Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

aiming.module.mlrs.name: MLRS瞄准模组
aiming.module.mlrs.description: The MLRS Aiming Module is a required item to use the MLRS, it can only be found in Locked Crates considering the power of the MLRS. After using the MLRS, the aiming module gets consumed.

carburetor2.name: 中品质化油器
carburetor2.description: A medium quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

crankshaft2.name: 中品质曲轴
crankshaft2.description: A medium quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

piston2.name: 中品质活塞
piston2.description: Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

sparkplug2.name: 中品质火星塞
sparkplug2.description: Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

valve2.name: 中品质气阀
valve2.description: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

metalblade.name: 金属刀片
metalblade.description:
Metal blades are common components that can be found in barrels near roads or at monuments. They are used to craft some tools and melee weapons.
If you don't have any use for the items you can craft with these it would be wise to recycle them for two scrap.

metalpipe.name: 金属管
metalpipe.description: Pipes are a relatively common component that are used for guns, salvaged tools, and rocket launchers and rockets. They can be somewhat abundant early game until you find the need to craft rockets, and then get consumed very quickly.

metalspring.name: 金属弹簧
metalspring.description: An uncommon component used for the construction of almost every gun. It may be found with moderate frequency from crates, and uncommonly from barrels. Generally speaking, guns of higher tiers will require more Metal Springs, while low tier guns (Semi Auto Pistol, Rifle) require only one.

vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.name: 后排座椅模组
vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.description: Single module seating for two passengers.

riflebody.name: 步枪枪身
riflebody.description: A rare component which is used for crafting late-game rifles. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

roadsigns.name: 路标
roadsigns.description: Road signs are a component used in the crafting of the mid-tier armors Road Sign Jacket, and Road Sign Kilt, along with crafting the salvaged cleaver. Also good as a source of scrap throughout the game.

rope.name: 绳索
rope.description:
Rope is quite common component used in many items like wooden armor, satchel charges, ladders and shotgun traps. Because of that it remains relatively useful throughout the whole game.
It can be often found in barrels alongside sewing kits which can be recycled for even more rope.

smgbody.name: 冲锋枪枪身
smgbody.description: A rare component which is used for crafting submachine guns. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

semibody.name: 半自动枪身
semibody.description: Semi Automatic Bodies are components used in the crafting of Semi-Auto Pistols and Semi-Auto Rifles. They can be found quite commonly and can be recycled for a good profit.

sewingkit.name: 针线包
sewingkit.description: Sewing Kits are highly valued by mid to high tier players for their use in both roadsign and metal Armour.

sheetmetal.name: 板金
sheetmetal.description: An uncommon component that can be recycled into Metal Fragments and High Quality Metal, or used in the crafting of Heavy Plate armor pieces. It can be found in crates and barrels.

sticks.name: 枝條
sticks.description: Sticks is an item that currently serves no purpose in the game.

tarp.name: 帆布
tarp.description: Tarps are used for the crafting of planter boxes, and water catchers. They can also be recycled for 50x cloth each. These are very common and can prove to be a good source of cloth.

vehicle.1mod.taxi.name: 计程车模组
vehicle.1mod.taxi.description: Single module seating for two passengers, with a window and a shop front at the front.

techparts.name: 一堆电子设备零件。
techparts.description: Tech Trash is an essential component in Timed Explosive Charges and weapon attachments. Tech Trash can be gained via military crates or the recycler.

electric.andswitch.name: AND Switch
electric.andswitch.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

electric.audioalarm.name: 警告音响
electric.audioalarm.description: A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered.

autoturret.name: 自动炮塔
autoturret.description:
The Auto Turret is a placed object used to detect enemies and shoot with its armed weapon. It detects enemies if the enemies were to reach its 180 degrees detection range or shoot the turret. The Auto Turret ignores the Tool Cupboard authorizations and only shoot people not in its authorize list so you and your team must authorize to it manually.
You can arm any ranged weapons onto the Auto Turret and insert the ammo of the equipped weapon. You must turn the turret off in order to refill ammo and weapon slot.
The Auto Turret can be turned on if the Power In slot is powering at least 10 rWm. There are 3 extra slots (Has Target, Low Ammo, No Ammo) that you can set up with Smart Alarm or traps, you must have 11 rWm for the Auto Turret to power the 3 slots. As an example, if someone walks into the detection range of the Auto Turret, 1 rWm will be used up to power out the Has Target slot.
The Auto Turret has 2 modes, Peacekeeper and Attack All. By default, Attack All mode makes the turret targets unauthorized players. Peacekeeper mode only shoots hostile players that has the red sight icon on the top right corner, it works just like the Outpost turrets and Bandit Camp turrets.

electric.blocker.name: 拦截器
electric.blocker.description: This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.

electric.button.name: 按钮
electric.button.description: If pressed on, Output sends power for a few seconds and deactivates itself. Works like a timer with no ability to change the time.

electric.cabletunnel.name: 电缆隧道
electric.cabletunnel.description: Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.

ceilinglight.name: 日光灯
ceilinglight.description: A small ceiling mounted light source. It speeds up plants in a planter growth by 2x.

computerstation.name: 电脑工作台
computerstation.description: The Computer Station can be used for real-time surveillance by pairing with any available CCTV Cameras. There are specific monuments with indestructible CCTV Cameras, the IDs are static and cannot be changed.

electric.counter.name: 计数器
electric.counter.description: A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.

xmas.lightstring.advanced.name: 豪华圣诞灯
xmas.lightstring.advanced.description: Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 electricity. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.

electric.doorcontroller.name: 门控制器
electric.doorcontroller.description: A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it recieves power.

electric.furnace.name: 电熔炉
electric.furnace.description: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

electric.heater.name: 电暖器
electric.heater.description:
The Electric Heater is very useful for bases on snow biome, it will completely remove the "TOO COLD" status and provide 50% "COMFORT" status when nearby, thus regenerating your health.
It can also be placed nearby plants to provide 100% temperature. However, placing electric heater in desert biome may downgrade the temperature of plants. This can also apply to players.

electrical.branch.name: 电力分离器
electrical.branch.description: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

elevator.name: 电梯
elevator.description: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

fluid.combiner.name: 流体组合器
fluid.combiner.description: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.

fluid.splitter.name: 流体分离器
fluid.splitter.description: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.

fluid.switch.name: 流体开关和泵
